"To geo-tag a plate, place a known point (Navaid, fix, airport/base) under the cross hair, then enter its name, select its type, then press the Geotag button. Repeat till the plate is tagged."

If this is not the correct SD card folder, then create a folder in root of SD card named Android/data/com.ds.avare, and select it from here
Register or unregister your Apps4Av account
"Select to display flight plan control buttons on chart view"

Thank you for installing Avare.
The development team for the free Avare aviation app is dedicated to empowering pilots with helpful free, open source, ad-free, and safe tools. To that end we have decided to require anonymous Registration of users in order to:

1. Advise users immediately in the event we discover any errors in the app or in the FAA materials we process and provide to our users at no charge.

2. Begin offering additional features useful to pilots, such as local airport info and attractions provided by pilots.

3. Enable the potential for future features such as direct anonymous but verified communication between users or devices such as sharing Waypoints, Tracks, and Plans.

4. Ensure that you assume all liability for your use of our free tools more conveniently, without the need to click an agreement at every launch of Avare.

The next screen provides more details on our Privacy Policy, and another opportunity to decline Registration.
Please press the Register button to continue.

You have now registered! Please press the back button to start using the application.
You must first download the Databases (Required) from the Download menu.
To see the detailed maps, please download the charts for the area you are interested in.
If you are unable to use the app, please email support@apps4av.org.
Select to use rubber banding on flight plan route
Show airports in Near with a runway length equal or longer
